name: Incanto
description: A fully responsive e-commerce website featuring a shopping cart with product management. It includes a mock Paystack payment integration for a real-world feel. Users can browse products, add them to their cart, and go through a smooth checkout process.

name: KreateSell
description: KreateSell is a user-friendly, all-in-one e-commerce platform designed especially for creators, entrepreneurs, and content producers—particularly across Africa—who want to sell digital products globally with ease.

name: Modiba Solutions
description: I worked on the frontend of a service-based business website using React and Next.js. I turned the Figma designs into responsive, clean pages and made sure everything looked good on all devices. I also worked with a backend engineer to connect things like the contact form and dynamic sections to the API. The goal was to keep the site fast, user-friendly, and easy to navigate.

name: iKlass Tutors
description: iKlass Tutors is an nline platform that connects students and parents with verified, skilled tutors for both in-person and online learning. I worked alongside a team of devlopers to create the interface along with implemen its core feature and functionlaities.

name: Task Organizer
description: This is a Task Organization web app that fetches and displays tasks from the JSONPlaceholder public API in a grid format. It’s built to be simple and easy to use, with pagination for smooth navigation through large sets of tasks. It also includes a search bar to quickly find tasks and a filter feature to narrow down results based on certain criteria.
